document_data.name: Idea
document_data.mainbody: '''Idea''' was a [[divination]] spell that [[monk]]s could use to gain a burst of inspiration toward solving a problem.
document_data.Effects: This spell induced a clarity of thought in the caster that could be used to prompt a memory of a forgotten detail or overlooked clue that was relevant to solving a conundrum. This spell had a cool-down period of six hours before it could be cast again.
document_data.Components: One [[gold piece]] was required to cast this spell, in addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components.
